Security analysis of your stored items.
Security issues detected. Consider updat: Security issues detected. Consider updating shared or short passwords to improve vault integrity.

Select at least one character set to gen: Select at least one character set to generate a password.
These operations permanently remove data: These operations permanently remove data and cannot be undone.
This creates a fresh encrypted backup of: This creates a fresh encrypted backup of your vault using the active settings.
This device does not have a local copy o: This device does not have a local copy of the secret. Rotate the secret to capture it again.
This passphrase encrypts or decrypts you: This passphrase encrypts or decrypts your vault backup. Use the same passphrase you will remember later.
Type passwords automatically using keybo: Type passwords automatically using keyboard shortcuts.
Unlocking requires both your master pass: Unlocking requires both your master password and an authenticator token.

backupProviderCustomDesc: Provide custom credentials for another provider.
backupProviderDropboxDesc: Use Dropbox as a destination for backups.
backupProviderS3Desc: Sync backups to your S3 bucket.
createNewVaultDesc: Start fresh with a new secure database file.
elevatedCopyFailed: Failed to copy the vault with elevated permissions.
failedToLoadVault: Failed to load the selected vault.
fileCheckError: An error occurred while checking the file.
importFailed: Failed to import the selected backup. Please verify the passphrase and try again.
loginSubtitle: Unlock your vault with your master password
migrateDesc: Import data from a backup or another manager.
openExistingDesc: Browse your files for an existing Pulsar vault.
passphraseRequired: A passphrase is required to unlock the selected backup.
pulsarTipBody: Keep your vault file on an encrypted drive for maximum security. Pulsar encrypts every item, but physical security matters too.
selectedRecentNotFound: Selected recent file could not be found.
settingsGeneralDescription: Manage default language, startup behaviour, and layout.
settingsGeneralKeyboardBody: Personalize key combinations to match your workflow and speed up navigation.
settingsGeneralKeyboardDesc: Customize shortcuts for frequently used actions.
settingsGeneralShowInTrayDesc: Keep the app accessible from the system tray.
settingsGeneralStartOnBootDesc: Launch automatically when your computer starts.
settingsGeneralTwoFactorDesc: Add extra layers of protection to vault access.
settingsGeneralTwoFactorNote: Configure per-vault overrides from the vaults settings page to enforce different requirements.
settingsVaultAutoBackupDesc: Schedule periodic backups for this vault.
settingsVaultBackupPassphrasePrompt: Enter a passphrase to secure the backup
settingsVaultCompressionDesc: Compress vault payloads to save disk space.
settingsVaultEmptyState: No vaults available yet. Create or import one to get started.
settingsVaultExportConfirmPlaintext: Export without encryption? Select “OK” to export plaintext data or “Cancel” to keep it encrypted.
settingsVaultExportPassphrasePrompt: Enter a passphrase for the export file
settingsVaultImportPassphrasePrompt: Enter the passphrase for the backup
settingsVaultRemoveConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from Pulsar? This will not delete the vault file, but it will be removed from your recent list and configuration.
settingsVaultRestorePassphrasePrompt: Enter the backup passphrase to restore
settingsVaultSelectPrompt: Select a vault from the list to adjust its settings.
settingsVaultSelectedSubtitle: Manage metadata and automation for this vault.
settingsVaultSubtitle: Select a vault to inspect and adjust its settings.
settingsVaultTotpDesc: Allow storing 2FA secrets inside this vault.
setupPasswordFieldsRequired: Please fill in both password fields.
setupPasswordLocalNote: This password stays on this device. Store it somewhere safe.
setupPasswordTip: Longer is better. Mix uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and symbols.
setupSubtitle: Create a strong master password to protect every secret in Pulsar.
totpBackupNote: Keep a backup of your authenticator secret. If this device loses the stored secret, you will still need your authenticator app to access the vault.
totpEnterCodeError: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator.
totpInvalidCodeError: The code was invalid or expired. Wait for the next 30-second window and try again.
totpSecretMissing: This device does not have the login authenticator secret. Use your enrolled authenticator app to generate the code.
totpSubtitle: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator to finish unlocking.
totpUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
welcomeSubtitle: Secure your digital life with professional-grade encryption.
